actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-141.

official_title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on the Judiciary for routine purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Committee on the Judiciary to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the 93d Congress, $25,000 in addition to the amount, and for the same purposes, specified in the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on the Judiciary for routine purposes.
